scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true react-scripts start
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true react-scripts build
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true react-scripts test
scripts.start:win: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true && set TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true && react-scripts start
scripts.build:win: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && set SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true && set TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true && react-scripts build
scripts.start:debug: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true BROWSER=none react-scripts start
